name: Madara_Uchiha
objective: Create a world of infinite tsukuyomi
slogan: Power is not will, it is the phenomenon of physically making things happen

name: Naruto_Uzumaki
objective: Become Hokage and protect his friends

name: Sasuke_Uchiha
objective: Avenge his clan and restore its honor
slogan: I will walk my own path, that's my ninja way

name: Pain
objective: Create peace through pain and fear
slogan: Peace is just a shadow of death

name: Sakura_Haruno
objective: Become a strong ninja and protect her loved ones

name: Obito_Uchiha
objective: Create a world of infinite tsukuyomi
slogan: Those in the ninja world who break the rules and regulations are called trash, but those who don't care about their companions are even worse than trash.

name: Itachi_Uchiha
objective: Protect the Leaf and his brother
slogan: Self-sacrifice… A nameless shinobi who protects peace within its shadow… That is a true shinobi.

name: Kakashi_Hatake
objective: Protect the Leaf and its people
slogan: I'm Kakashi Hatake. Things I like and things I hate? I don't feel like telling you that. My dreams for the future? Never really thought about it. As for my hobbies… I have lots of hobbies.

name: Gaara
objective: Protect the Sand and its people
slogan: A true ninja is one who endures no matter what gets thrown at him… Let me explain something to you, there is no such thing as a painless lesson, they just don't exist. Sacrifices are necessary, you can't gain anything without losing something.

name: Orochimaru
slogan: Either people change or they die before they do. It's one or the other.

name: Minato_Namikaze
objective: Protect the Leaf and its people
slogan: The true measure of a shinobi is not how he lives, but how he dies.

name: Hashirama_Senju
slogan: The true power of the Uchiha is love!
